item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Kitchen Zinc

Kitchen Zinc is a new artisanal pizza restaurant and bar on the Temple Street Courtyard (behind Zinc off of Chapel Street), by the owners of Zinc. This is the first visit by the NHC, so let's represent in force!

Drink specials are $3 beer and $5 glasses of wine all evening long.

Many thanks to A.J. for setting up this happy hour, and for serving as our contact for the night. He can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Kitchen Zinc
